Pc For Conext Etc

Pc For Conext Etc

30 Jan 2015

Phillipa will serving on the program committees for: ACM CoNEXT ‘15, ACNS '15, Usenix ATC '15, and ACM IMC '15. Phillipa will be also co-chairing the Usenix Workshop on Free and Open Communication on the Internet (FOCI).

College of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Massachusetts Amherst
